message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save even more. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your desire to save even more, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more move. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $11250. It's my final offer, and I'm confident it's the best price you'll get for this amazing product.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.
